heading: David Klotz
text: continuation ongoing quest translate Roman inscriptions Esna temple. first volume inscriptions, Esna II (book Esna introductory volume, without hieroglyphic texts), now complete, although continue make changes updates. goal make information easily accessible. blog easy read update, difficult search cross reference. database certainly slower navigate, particularly translations texts.

heading: The Present Volume
text: Esna III devoted columns within pronaos, covered extensive columns hieroglyphic texts. largely detail many festivals rituals performed Esna satellite temples, associated hymns recorded extenso. Many texts translated short commentary original editor, Serge Sauneron, masterful volume Sauneron 1962.published volumes Esna temple recently (2021) released open-access PDFs IFAO. translation contain link original hieroglyphic text, details secondary literature, drawing heavily Tempeltexte 2.0 database.Esna III far largest densest volume series, covering scenes #194-398 (inscriptions). far, 207/207 (100%) scenes complete online. Esna II, present transliterations translations provisional, plan proofread standardize spellings completed remaining Esna volumes, prepare comprehensive indexes. acutely aware need review certain texts light recent publications Esna, particularly D. von Recklinghausen 2022.

heading: Contribute!
text: welcome feedback project, whether regarding format, corrections, alternative suggestions translations, notes important references might overlooked. perhaps like volunteer translate certain texts! may contact directly shemanefer@gmail.com. course fully acknowledge suggestions, add list contributors.also appreciate help relevant bibliography, especially newer monographs. already basic references digital paper form, noticing major omissions, please let know.
